page.title: 17The Health Service,Whitby.
page.content: {Whitby Hospital}has a{Community {Health Centre}staffed by a team of doctors, each a specialist in his own field.The hospital runs daily surgeries and is responsible for all casualty, emergency and maternity services. A fully equipped{Day Centre cares for the elderly and provides occupational therapy. Whitby{Ambulance Station} has 12 members and operates 5 vehicles. Emergency calls are received via Scarborough. The station is manned from 7.00a.m. to 11.00p.m. but this may soon change due to cutbacks. During other hours, drivers are on 'stand-by.' Serious emergencies are transferred from the casualty department of Whitby Hospital to Scarborough or Middlesbrough Hospitals.
